microsoft_timer
Headings-> Syntax Purpose s Linking
Microsoft Version of Elapsed Number of Seconds
Syntax
s = microsoft_timer()
Purpose
This routine is accurate to within .02 seconds (see elapsed_seconds.cpp which uses this routine when the preprocessor symbol _MSC_VER is defined). It does not necessary work for time intervals that are greater than a day. It uses ::GetSystemTime for timing.
s
is a double equal to the number of seconds since the first call to microsoft_timer.
Linking
The source code for this routine is located in speed/microsoft_timer.cpp. The preprocessor symbol _MSC_VER must be defined, or this routine is not compiled.
Input File: speed/src/microsoft_timer.cpp
